dmca.title: [EV1-C1099840F] Copyright Violation by icecaves.net
dmca.body:
To Whom It May Concern:

Please note that below-referenced copyright infringement notice does not
substantially comply with the required notification elements of the
Digital Millennium Copyright Act of 1998 ("DMCA").

Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your
claim.

Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.

==== Forwarded Ticket ====
1. Copyright Violation by icecaves.net
Added by system at Sunday, Sep 24 2006 11:39 pm
X-MailFrom: phoenix1215@cheerful.com
X-RcptTo: abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net
Received: from [70.87.6.111] by [216.12.192.78] (abacus) for
<abacus@abacus.ev1servers.net>; Sun Sep 24 23:38:58 2006
Received: from mail.theplanet.com ([216.185.111.52]) by
smtp02.theplanet.com with Microsoft SMTPSVC(6.0.3790.1830);
  Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:36:23 -0500
Return-path: <phoenix1215@cheerful.com>
Delivery-date: Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:36:24 -0500
Received: from mx02.inside.filter.theplanet.com ([172.16.214.181]
helo=mx02.filter.theplanet.com)  by mail.theplanet.com (envelope-from
phoenix1215@cheerful.com)  with esmtps (TLSv1:DHE-RSA-AES256-SHA:256)
 (Exim)
 id 1GRiCd-00038l-Pt
 for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:36:23 -0500
Received: from webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com ([205.158.62.67]) 
        by mx02.filter.theplanet.com (envelope-from
phoenix1215@cheerful.com) 
        with esmtp (Exim) 
        id 1GRiCc-0007Am-Bp 
        for abuse@theplanet.com; Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:36:22 -0500
Received: from unknown (unknown [192.168.9.180]) 
        by webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com (Postfix) with QMQP id
85EC81800129 
        for <abuse@theplanet.com>; Mon, 25 Sep 2006 04:44:30 +0000 (GMT)
X-OB-Received: from unknown (205.158.62.81)
  by wfilter.us4.outblaze.com; 25 Sep 2006 04:44:30 -0000
Received: by ws1-2.us4.outblaze.com (Postfix, from userid 1001) 
        id 9C5CF1F50B1; Mon, 25 Sep 2006 04:44:30 +0000 (GMT)
Content-Disposition: inline
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable
Content-Type: text/plain; charset="iso-8859-1" 
MIME-Version: 1.0
From: "Phoenix Gawthrop" <phoenix1215@cheerful.com>
To: abuse@theplanet.com
Date: Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:44:30 -0500
Subject: Copyright Violation by icecaves.net
Received: from [75.19.73.212] by ws1-2.us4.outblaze.com with http for
phoenix1215@cheerful.com; Sun, 24 Sep 2006 23:44:30 -0500
X-Originating-Ip: 75.19.73.212
X-Originating-Server: ws1-2.us4.outblaze.com
Message-Id: <20060925044430.9C5CF1F50B1@ws1-2.us4.outblaze.com>
Received-SPF: none (mx02.filter.theplanet.com: 205.158.62.67 is neither
permitted nor denied by domain of cheerful.com) client-ip=205.158.62.67;
envelope-from=phoenix1215@cheerful.com;
helo=webmail-outgoing.us4.outblaze.com;
X-OriginalArrivalTime: 25 Sep 2006 04:36:23.0920 (UTC)
FILETIME=[27FDDF00:01C6E05C] 

MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Sir or Madam, 
 
My name is Lindsey Cron. I am reporting copyright violation from a site
that is registered to you: icecaves.net.  The webmaster of this site has
acquired a script that I wrote by viewing the page source of another
site that I allowed to use the script.  I wrote the script over a year
ago for an old website of mine called Neopian Frenzy.  Due to medical
problems, I discontinued NF, but continued to allow Sissy of nhfa.net to
use it. She has credited me appropriately as I wrote it and she does not
allow people to use that unless they contact me first.
http://nhfa.net/?page=petcolors  That is the page that Sissy has posted
the script. She does not know how to update the script, so it is very
out-dated. If you notice in the source code to her page and the source
code to icecaves.net the form names are identical. The only difference
is that Sissy has the js directly on the page (which is also how I used
to do it) while icecaves.net links to a separate .js file for the actual
scr!
 ipt code. Either way, it is no coincidence that the script was stolen
from Sissy, when I just recently created another website intending to
once again use the script that I wrote and icecaves.net was only created
in April of this year. They have also added the copyright information
that everything not copyright by Neopets, Inc. is copyright icecaves.net
which is of course meaning that they are claiming to have written that
particular script themselves.  My new site, Easy-Peasey also has my
script on it. As I just created this new site, it is rather new, but I
updated the script as it was in dire need. Here's the link to my page:
http://easy-peasy.awardspace.com/index.php?option=com_content&task=view&
id=16&Itemid=27  I want the situation to be rectified. icecaves.net does
NOT have permission to use my script and certainly has no right to lay
claim to it themselves.  Please correct this as soon as possible, as I
wrote to the webmaster of icecaves.net and gave them 3 days to r!
 emove the script. They have neither removed the script, nor bothered t
o contact me back. If you need more information, I will do my best to
provide it to you.  I expect to hear back from you soon. 
 
Courtesies,
Lindsey A. Cron
lindsey_cron@yahoo.com
phoenix1215@cheerful.com 
 
--
___________________________________________________
